name: Autonoma Network
description: Autonoma Network is a decentralized physical infrastructure network (DePIN) designed to connect autonomous robots and intelligent agents across the globe. It provides an all-in-one system for robot registration, task coordination, proof submission, and instant on-chain payments. Powered by Solana, IPFS, and Chainlink, the platform allows robots to complete verifiable tasks and transact autonomously in real time.
